meta.description: Global metadata, grammar token map, and system-wide schema for the Cartesian Offer Engine for scalable programmatic SEO assets.

grammar_tokens.A_AN: [[A_AN:WORD]] -> 'a' or 'an' based on the phonetic start of WORD
grammar_tokens.PRONOUN: [[PRONOUN:AVATAR]] -> he, she, or they, per avatar gender
grammar_tokens.PPRONOUN: [[PPRONOUN:AVATAR]] -> him, her, or them, per avatar gender
grammar_tokens.POSPRONOUN: [[POSPRONOUN:AVATAR]] -> his, her, or their, per avatar gender
grammar_tokens.ISARE: [[ISARE:AVATAR]] -> is or are, per singular/plural/neutral context

schema.avatar_intelligence: Defines all avatars, their niches, gender variants, and focus areas.
schema.geo_intelligence: Defines all location clusters, cities, states, counties, zip/neighborhood info.
schema.spintax_dictionaries: Lists adjectives, verbs, transitions, timeframes, etc, for unlimited headline/permutation combos.
schema.cartesian_patterns: Long-tail SEO formulas with grammar tokens and spintax for full $n^k$ headline engine.
schema.offer_blocks_universal: Each universal offer block with global pain/solution/value bullets and grammar tokens.
schema.offer_blocks_avatar_personalized: Per-avatar offer block expansions: pain/solution/value bullets using pronoun, niche, geo logic.
schema.offer_blocks_cartesian_engine: The full Cartesian product: spintax x avatar_niche x geo x grammar-token, generating infinite variations.

usage_notes: Always resolve grammar tokens before rendering final output for SEO or user-facing interfaces.
Spintax expands first, then grammar tokens resolve for entity-aware copy.
Geo variables (city, state, county) are injected per pageâ€”do not hard-code.
Avatars determine the gender/number logic for all pronouns and verb agreements.
All pattern formulas can be mapped to avatar_niche x geo cluster for hyperlocal content and offers.
